name: Young Monk
description:
Gameplay

A young boy has just been entered into a Buddhist monastery, thus beginning his journey into monkhood. Help him clear his mind and reach Nirvana by shooting thoughts away from his headspace. 

Controls

Note: Some thoughts can only be blocked with a Special Zen Wave

Mouse: Aim Zen Waves to push away enemies 
Space: When your aura glows yellow, send a Special Zen Wave
